title: Evelynn  Ravage (E) damage lowered to 50/90/130/160/210 from 70/110/150/190/230
body:
What in the actual fuck, seriously? Why not make her a walking ward and call it a day riot?

Edit: Nerf reverted, let's hope it stays like this.

replies.body: The fact that she is an assassin/mage yet builds AD tank should say enough about her currents state. No need to nerf.

She even has a ~50% winrate according to lolking, so I'm confused. It looks like she's in that perfectly fine spot of losing as much as she wins, but somehow Riot wasn't satisfied and thinks Evelynn is OP and needs a nerf...?

She CAN be rather strong when build AP Assassin, but Rengar still deletes you a hell of a lot faster than Evelynn can.

And the reason Eve's being compared to Rengar is that they fill the same niche, a jungle assassin who deletes people if they can get fed.  And Rengar absolutely does it better.  So why are they nerfing Eve first if Rengar's this horrible overpowered toxic champion?

Idk how you don't understand what's going on. They've done this with DOZENS of champions.

They don't like them, they think they're unhealthy, they nerf them into garbage until a rework. I'm not saying you should agree or like it, but you should KNOW that's what is happening. Urgot, Sion, Heimerdinger, Olaf, Kassadin, and many more. 

They aren't trying to BALANCE her.

True, I didn't mean to insinuate that it makes her a good pick if you're wanting to go a particular route.  What I meant is that she is somewhat reactionary.  If you find yourself in a situation where you need to choose between going AD, AP or tank, then Eve is able to go in any direction while still being usable.  Not every champ has that distinction.

Reasons like this are why I dropped her as my main after her rework.
I was perfectly happy with her nerfed version where they completely gutted her, removed her stun, removed half her healing from her ult, and banned people for playing her.  I still had fun and enjoyed my games as the trashy shadow walker.

Then they remade her into a Shyvana wannabe with stealth and completely ruined her playstyle for me, and I dropped her like a hot potato after playing nothing but Eve for thousands of games.

They don't care about this champion, and I'd recommend anyone who mains her to find a new one.
Morde, Darius and Garen are 100% pick or ban, BETTER NERF EVELYNN

While her win-rate is fairly average (50%) those with many games on her are getting 57% 

http://champion.gg/champion/Evelynn/Jungle

This is significantly higher than 53-4%, the number a Rioter (Repetoir, I think) suggested as the 'ideal' win rate for experienced players on a balanced champion. Based purely on statistics, some nerf is warranted.

No, this makes no sense. Look at the top, like, 20-ish mid laners. They all peak over 55% at various experience levels. The most egregious outliers being Zilean, Lux, Heimer, etc. who effectively hit 60% at different points and/or never dip below 50% for **anyone.**

Champs like Vayne and Draven also both have very steep skill curves with high win rates for very experienced players and very low win rates for inexperienced players. This is supposed to be acceptable design.

Then you have Evelynn, whose skill floor and cap are both far higher than Xin Zhao, yet Xin's win rate ranges only from 52% to 57%, not 45% to 56%.  Yet Evelynn is the one getting nerfed which makes exactly zero fucking sense.

Yes, that's a pretty high win rate, but she's also a champion who's not seen much any more, one that generally sucks during the first few games her players try with her, and one that generally works well against tank junglers.  With how low her play rate is, she's getting close to counterpick status, like Malphite, a champion who is also reaching high win percentages at high experience levels.

http://champion.gg/champion/Malphite/Top

So even if Riot pulls this reasoning for her getting nerfed, I'm going to call bull on it because there ARE champions out there who have win rates like this at high experience levels who don't need nerfs and aren't getting hit.  Heimerdinger hits that level of win rate at far lower numbers of games.  Lux and Zilean kick both of them to the curb. Wukong too.  So why is it that only Evelynn can't have nice things out of any of those?

*sigh* 

I'm just gonna come out and say it.

Eve needs a rework.

Her stealth is far too strong on a champion who's meant to burst squishies.

>But her stealth isn't permanent, she becomes visible before you can hit anyone!

Passive range 700
Ult range 650/250

By the time you see Eve, she's already killing you.
Her stealth leaves little time for anyone below challenger to react. (See {{champion:107}} syndrome)

About the only thing that keeps her viable is the fact that her kit has a little bit of almost everything a jungler could ever want.  
DPS style ability.  Check
AD and AP scalings. Check
Attack speed and move speed buffs. Check
These leave Eve with a kit that is open to a LOT of different build options.

All the same, her stealth is holding her back.  
Riot doesn't like when a champ is able to blow you up from stealth with little to no chance to counter play.

Going purely on reaction speed means you have more of a chance to react to her attack and damage.

2. Junglers want CC. Evelynn has  a slow on her ult. She has nearly no CC. No CC means being more reliant on your laner for damage AND CC. Due to her low damage early game, she has the hardest time landing early game kills unless she swaps flash out for an offensive spell such as exhaust or ignite. 
3. Base stats? Evelynn is low on all of them.
4. Gap closers. She has none.
5. MS enhancers/ Udyr has it, and can spam it to be constant. Hers is not constant. Ever
6.  Having two scalings is not a desired trait. It adds flexibility to building, but isn't an indemand thing. Look at Rengar, Sejuani, Lee sin.
7. Attack speed is not a useful stat in and of itself. Look at AD casters such as Vi, Pantheon, Kha'zix. They don't build attack speed.

Hate spike is sustained. 
Ravage is burst.
Agon'y embrace is tank ability. (lol wut?)

She builds either warrior's or runeglaive.

Why was her burst nerfed so hard?

Because it came out of no where.

Because by the time you saw her, you knew it was too late.
